N-glycan Core

n_glycan_core.Rd

Create a N-glycan core graph, either in NE or DN mode.

    Man
  a1-6 \   b1-4      b1-4
        Man -- GlcNAc -- GlcNAc
  a1-3 /
    Man

Usage

n_glycan_core(mode = "ne", linkage = TRUE)

n_glycan_core_ne(linkage = TRUE)

n_glycan_core_dn(linkage = TRUE)

Arguments

mode

A character string, either "ne" or "dn".

linkage

A logical indicating whether to include linkages. Default is TRUE.

Value

A glycan graph object.

Examples

print(n_glycan_core(mode = "ne"), verbose = TRUE)
#> Glycan Graph (NE)
#> GlcNAc: 2, Man: 3
#> ------------------
#> GlcNAc
#> └─GlcNAc (b1-4)
#>   └─Man (b1-4)
#>     ├─Man (a1-3)
#>     └─Man (a1-6)
print(n_glycan_core(mode = "dn"), verbose = TRUE)
#> Glycan Graph (DN)
#> GlcNAc: 2, Man: 3
#> ------------------
#> GlcNAc
#> └─b1-4
#>   └─GlcNAc
#>     └─b1-4
#>       └─Man
#>         ├─a1-3
#>         │ └─Man
#>         └─a1-6
#>           └─Man
